summary: A nuclear armed SS20 will be smuggled from Russia via Finland to Sweden unless Swedish agent Hamilton +5 stop them with "no loose ends". What about the other stolen SS20?
cast: Peter Stormare|Lena Olin|Mark Hamill|Mats Långbacka|Terry Carter|Evgeniy Lazarev|Zakia Tahri|Christer Söderlund|Per Grytt|Per Flygare|Madeleine Elfstrand|Andrey Smolyakov|Thomas Hedengran|Anders Lidberg|Mikael Ahlberg|Torbjörn Fält|Stanislav Klimuskin|Valeriy Priyomykhov|Jon Holmberg|Yuriy Sherstnyov|Viktor Sergachyov|Valeri Eresmishev|Bengt Haglund|Lena-Pia Bernhardsson|Tord Holm|Krister Henriksson|Douglas Johansson|Ilja Jakerson|Monte Reid|Harry Van Gorkum|Sean-Michael Smith|Gustav Levin|Niels Dybeck|Karim Doukkali|Abdel Kebir Ragagna|Jakov Akopian|Göran Forsmark
title: Comando Hamilton
